name: billyamericana
text: Ray shit on a live fish who is telling him his problems. I don't care what you say, the boy's rude.

name: hikikomori
text:
The next Fear Factor challenge!

You have to shit. On a live fish. Who is telling you his problems.

name: farqussus
text: I did that already shrooming.

name: hikikomori
text: Daaaaaaaamn!

name: theguitarhero
text: Best avatar/comment combo ever.

name: plummet
text: Holy Shit and Jesus Christ this asset is in-fucking-credible

name: soticoto
text: If you love it so much, why don't you marry it?

name: genequagmire
text: The rudest!

name: deimosrising
text: Alt text here is the key component, though Ray's innocent curiosity is also fantastic.

name: aperson
text:
Alt Text: (And so it would seem that Barry Bass got his Fear Factor after all)

Pet hate: Alt text references sans provision of aforementioned alt text.

name: stuart
text: Ashamedly, I think of Eminem's Without Me video.

name: never_die
text: ray's so lax about there being a fish in the toilet.  like it's not a thing.

name: spicyponyhead
text: It's so not a Thing, it doesn't even require an exclamation point.

name: havenless
text: We all know fish like this.

name: honesttom
text: To be fair, a fish in the toilet is a slow day for Ray.

name: tekende
text: Tuesday, generally.

name: closefriend
text: I would take care to constantly remind Barry that he's one tip of a handle from getting "deported" again.

name: evolume
text: the water is filling slow because tipping the handle is not enough to flush this true free-loader.

name: turnabout
text: This is a top-ten strip. The alt-text is the 4th punchline.

name: peterjoel
text: Fear Factor: Sit for days in 6 inches of toilet water, while cats periodically shit and piss on you.

name: rowboat
text: OK. All the justifications I was coming up with for Barry - fuck that. Fry the bitch up!

name: stormagnet
text: ...after he's been living in the toilet?!

name: rowboat
text: Deep, deep fry.

name: spinynorman
text: A toilet is probably far cleaner than most fishes' natural habitats.

name: canusdivinus
text: As long as you flush periodically.

name: hyetal
text: It is not necessary to eat that fish just kill it for God's sake.

name: bee_food
text: This is my favorite strip.

name: paby
text: Why wouldn't he just have put him in the tank instead of the bowl?

name: zapatos
text: Barry asked for a small goldfish bowl, Beef obliges.

name: drskradley
text: Beef's showing of major balls in sticking Barry in the toilet surprises me every time. That shit's stone cold.

name: ham_shoes
text: Charles Mingus owes somebody an apology

name: troy_convers
text: I imagine Jason Alexnder as the voice of Barry Bass.

name: admiral_klank
text: I'd like to believe that Beef already had waterproof travel checkers, but this incident gave him an opportunity to bust em out.
